item.description:
Ok, so Tuesday Karaoke has died the big one in this area!  So off we go to Wednesday for Karaoke, food and dancing! :-)

 

I tried out Dukes last week and it was great!  Good sound system, BIG dance floor, great folk, classy place, and still good prices for drink AND food, just see the menu here and here.  Lots of TVs for the games too.  Booths, tables, tall table and the bar provide lots of room for us.

 

DJ MA (Mark) has a great selection of stuff, including live versions of songs.  He keeps up a rotation and even came right over to me when I first came in because he recognized me from other venues. :-D

 

Unlike huge breaks in the evening for dance music, DJ MA pops in an occasional dance song or two so it doesn't shut down the singing, but dancers get to do some movin.  And with the big floor, it works great.

.     

So let's start the NEW weekly Karaoke/food/dance thing!  - Tom c(603)521-8392

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: WED Karaoke at Duke's Pub &Grille in Tyngsboro
